body_html:
@rongjiecomputer I see, thanks for the info.

I don't know the history behind why this macro was written the way it is. And it's used all over the place, internally as well.

Perhaps the best thing to do is to try your suggestion. Can you update your PR to use your new implementation for all compilers?

Once you're done, ping this issue. If all the tests pass, we can try merging it.

body:
@rongjiecomputer I see, thanks for the info.

I don't know the history behind why this macro was written the way it is.  And it's used all over the place, internally as well.

Perhaps the best thing to do is to try your suggestion.  Can you update your PR to use your new implementation for all compilers?

Once you're done, ping this issue.  If all the tests pass, we can try merging it.
